remarks: Negation of a product in a ring.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)
statement:
ringnegmul.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringnegmul.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
ringnegmul.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
ringnegmul.4 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
rngoneglmul $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A H B ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) H B ) ) $.
